pair.title: Add Fully Browser
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.unauthorized: Error 401: this password is not authorized; make sure this password is the same as the password entered in the Fully Browser settings.
pair.timeout: Timeout error: make sure you have entered the correct URL and that the Fully Browser is online.
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct URL and Homey is on the same network as the Fully Browser? Please check your settings and try again.
pair.noconnection: Connection is refushed, please verify the URL and try again.
pair.intro: Make sure remote administration is enabled in the Fully browser with a password. Enter the URL of your Fully browser and the password in the following fields:
pair.testing: Fully Browser connection test succesfull, found device with name: __deviceName__
